zh-cn: 杰尼斯·瓦连京诺维奇·曼图罗夫

birth_place.zh-cn: 苏联俄罗斯苏维埃联邦社会主义共和国摩尔曼斯克

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯政治家，自2012年起担任俄罗斯联邦工业和贸易部长，后兼任副总理、第一副总理。
description.en: Russian politician, who has served as the Minister of Industry and Trade of the Russian Federation since 2012, and later also as Deputy Prime Minister and First Deputy Prime Minister.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯联邦政府的高级官员职位。
description.en: A high-ranking official position in the Government of the Russian Federation.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯政治家，现任俄罗斯总理。
description.en: Russian politician, current Prime Minister of Russia.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯政治家。
description.en: Russian politician.

description.en: Russian politician, current President of Russia.

description.en: Russian politician, former President and Prime Minister of Russia.

nodes.id: 2024年弗拉基米尔·普京访问朝鲜

zh-cn: 2024年弗拉基米尔·普京访问朝鲜
en: 2024 Vladimir Putin visit to North Korea

description.zh-cn: 杰尼斯·曼图罗夫自2024年5月14日起担任俄罗斯第一副总理。
description.en: Denis Manturov has served as the First Deputy Prime Minister of Russia since May 14, 2024.

description.zh-cn: 杰尼斯·曼图罗夫于2022年被任命为俄罗斯副总理。
description.en: Denis Manturov was appointed Deputy Prime Minister of Russia in 2022.

relationships.target: 俄罗斯联邦工业和贸易部

description.zh-cn: 杰尼斯·曼图罗夫自2012年2月2日起代理俄罗斯联邦工业和贸易部部长，并于同年5月21日正式就任。
description.en: Denis Manturov served as Acting Minister of Industry and Trade of the Russian Federation from February 2, 2012, and was formally appointed on May 21 of the same year.

description.zh-cn: 在米哈伊尔·米舒斯京担任总理期间，杰尼斯·曼图罗夫在其政府中先后担任工业和贸易部长、副总理及第一副总理。
description.en: During Mikhail Mishustin's premiership, Denis Manturov served in his government successively as Minister of Industry and Trade, Deputy Prime Minister, and First Deputy Prime Minister.

description.zh-cn: 在德米特里·梅德维杰夫担任总理期间，杰尼斯·曼图罗夫担任工业和贸易部长。
description.en: During Dmitry Medvedev's premiership, Denis Manturov served as Minister of Industry and Trade.

description.zh-cn: 在维克托·祖布科夫代理总理期间，杰尼斯·曼图罗夫担任代理工业和贸易部长。
description.en: During Viktor Zubkov's acting premiership, Denis Manturov served as Acting Minister of Industry and Trade.

description.zh-cn: 在弗拉迪米尔·普丁担任总理期间，杰尼斯·曼图罗夫担任代理工业和贸易部长。在普丁担任总统期间，曼图罗夫被任命为副总理并随其出访。
description.en: During Vladimir Putin's premiership, Denis Manturov served as Acting Minister of Industry and Trade. During Putin's presidency, Manturov was appointed Deputy Prime Minister and accompanied him on foreign visits.

description.zh-cn: 杰尼斯·曼图罗夫接替安德烈·别洛乌索夫出任俄罗斯第一副总理。
description.en: Denis Manturov succeeded Andrey Belousov as the First Deputy Prime Minister of Russia.

relationships.target: 维克托·鲍里索维奇·赫里斯坚科

description.zh-cn: 杰尼斯·曼图罗夫接替辞去职务的维克托·赫里斯坚科，担任代理俄罗斯联邦工业和贸易部长。
description.en: Denis Manturov succeeded Viktor Khristenko, who had resigned, as the Acting Minister of Industry and Trade of the Russian Federation.

description.zh-cn: 弗拉迪米尔·普京签署总统令，任命杰尼斯·曼图罗夫为副总理。
description.en: Vladimir Putin signed a presidential decree appointing Denis Manturov as Deputy Prime Minister.

description.zh-cn: 杰尼斯·曼图罗夫于1994年毕业于莫斯科国立大学。
description.en: Denis Manturov graduated from Moscow State University in 1994.

relationships.target: 2024年弗拉基米尔·普京访问朝鲜

description.zh-cn: 杰尼斯·曼图罗夫随同俄罗斯总统普京出访朝鲜。
description.en: Denis Manturov accompanied Russian President Vladimir Putin on his visit to North Korea.
